animeTitle: Koukaku Kidoutai Arise: Ghost in the Shell - Border:3 Ghost Tears
animeDescription: Third movie of Ghost in the Shell: Arise.Motoko and Batou work to try to stop a terrorist organization whose symbol is the Scylla. Meanwhile, Togusa investigates a murder of a man who possessed a prosthetic leg manufactured by the Mermaid's Leg corporation.(Source: Wikipedia)
